1.0.2 / 2014-04-29
==================

 * only version compatible with node.js 0.8
 * support headers given to `res.writeHead`
 * deps: bytes@0.3.0
 * deps: negotiator@0.4.3

1.0.1 / 2014-03-08
==================

 * bump negotiator
 * use compressible
 * use .headersSent (drops 0.8 support)
 * handle identity;q=0 case
